hint.text: Sum of exterior angles of a polygon taken in order is \(360^o\)

solution.text:
Sum of exterior angles in the figure should be \(360^o\)
Hence \(x+y+z+60+j+k=360\)
\(x+y+z=360-60-_{j}_-_{k}_\)
\(x+y+z=_{{300-j-k}}_\)

content.text: Find the value of \(x + y + z\) where value of j is _{j}_ and value of k is _{k}_
